Date and time of the recordâ€™s last update.
Identifier of the pipeline integration run, used to differentiate each batch of integrated data.
ETL Conventions:
Defined at the start of the pipeline as `datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d%H%M%S")`.
For example a batch integrated on 15/09/2025 at 00:00:00 has `upload_id = 20250915000000`.
